titleStmt.title: The prophecy of the white king explained, compared with severall copies, both Welsh, Latine, and English: some of which were written almost a thousand years agoe, besides this old English copy here printed, which was of high esteem in the dayes of King Edward the fourth.
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681, attributed name.
Braithwaite, William, fl. 1649, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Lilly or William Braithwaite in the Wrenn catalogue.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 26 1648"; the "9" in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
